title: Chihayafuru
summary: A high school girl with a passion for the traditional card game karuta, seeks to build a team and bring the game back to the limelight.

title: The Ancient Magus' Bride
summary: A girl is sold to a non-human sorcerer to be his apprentice and bride, discovering a magical world full of strange creatures and unexpected love.

title: Kakuriyo no Yadomeshi
summary: A girl works at a traditional inn in the supernatural world, learning to live among spirits and demons while facing love and challenges.

title: March Comes in Like a Lion
summary: A young professional Shogi player struggles with personal issues and finds solace in a family of three sisters who help him find balance in life.

title: Toradora!
summary: Two high school students with opposite personalities form an unlikely alliance to help each other with their crushes, only to develop feelings for each other.

title: Kimi ni Todoke
summary: A shy and misunderstood girl forms a bond with the most popular boy in her school, eventually opening her heart to love and friendship.

title: Ano Hi Mita Hana no Namae wo Bokutachi wa Mada Shiranai
summary: A group of childhood friends reunites years after the tragic death of one of their own, struggling with unresolved feelings and their past.

title: Orange
summary: A high school girl receives a letter from her future self and tries to prevent the tragedy that will befall her friend, leading to a deeper understanding of love and regret.

title: ReLIFE
summary: A 27-year-old man is given a chance to relive his high school life as part of an experiment, trying to make better decisions for his future.

title: Fruits Basket (2019)
summary: A high school girl becomes involved with a family cursed to transform into animals of the Chinese zodiac, as they struggle with their past and love.
